name: Tempest of Fate
description:
A game by Aurnyx

pixel art was for the most part done using Pyxel

music and sound effects made with beepbox.co

game created using Unity

Help two star-crossed lovers rejoin in the middle of a perilous storm. Made for the minimalist game jam.

If you enjoy the game, please follow me on twitter at https://twitter.com/aurnyx
